text: Radu Ioan Chiriac (born 4 January 2000) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Astra Giurgiu.L-a cucerit după primele zile I "Edi Iordănescu e cel mai bun dintre toţi antrenorii cu care am lucrat". telekomsport.ro ==Honours== ;Astra Giurgiu *Cupa României: Runner-up 2018–19 ==References== ==External links== * * * Radu Chiriac at lpf.ro Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Iași Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Argeș Pitești players Category:Liga I players Category:FC Astra Giurgiu players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Metaloglobus București players
title: Radu Chiriac
